languages.text: "А! Жаль. Я заметил комбинацию еще когда мы зашли, и все это время горел желанием спросить, каков был замысел того, кто играл за белые фигуры..."

traits.locale_text: "А! Жаль. Я заметил комбинацию еще когда мы зашли, и все это время горел желанием спросить, каков был замысел того, кто играл за белые фигуры..."

languages.text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."
languages.original_text: "А! Жаль. Я заметил комбинацию еще когда мы зашли, и все это время горел желанием спросить, каков был замысел того, кто играл за белые фигуры..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."
"Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."
"Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."
"Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."

languages.text: “啊！这太遗憾了。刚刚一进这个房间，我就注意到了那样的阵型。我一直都想问问白棋为什么要那么走……”
languages.original_text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."

traits.locale_text: “啊！这太遗憾了。刚刚一进这个房间，我就注意到了那样的阵型。我一直都想问问白棋为什么要那么走……”

languages.text: «¡Ah! Es una lástima. Me había fijado en la combinación nada más llegar y quería preguntar por la estrategia de las blancas...».
languages.original_text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah! Es una lástima. Me había fijado en la combinación nada más llegar y quería preguntar por la estrategia de las blancas...».

languages.text: 「ああ！残念だ。入ってすぐにこの組み合わせに気づいたから、白の戦略の裏にある考え方を聞きたかったのだが…」
languages.original_text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ！残念だ。入ってすぐにこの組み合わせに気づいたから、白の戦略の裏にある考え方を聞きたかったのだが…」

languages.text: « Ah ! Quel dommage. J'ai remarqué cette manœuvre dès notre arrivée et depuis, je ne peux pas m'empêcher de m'interroger sur la stratégie des blancs... »
languages.original_text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."

traits.locale_text: « Ah ! Quel dommage. J'ai remarqué cette manœuvre dès notre arrivée et depuis, je ne peux pas m'empêcher de m'interroger sur la stratégie des blancs... »

languages.text: "Ah! Wirklich schade. Mir ist die Kombination direkt aufgefallen, als wir reinkamen, und ich will unbedingt wissen, was hinter der Strategie von Weiß steckt ..."
languages.original_text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah! Wirklich schade. Mir ist die Kombination direkt aufgefallen, als wir reinkamen, und ich will unbedingt wissen, was hinter der Strategie von Weiß steckt ..."

languages.text: "Ya! Bu kötü oldu. İçeri girdiğimiz an kombinasyonu fark ettim, beyaz oyuncunun stratejisinin ardında yatan şey hakkında soru sormaya niyetliydim..."
languages.original_text: "Ah! That's a shame. I noticed the combination as soon as we came in, and I've been eager to ask about the thinking behind white's strategy..."
